page.title: 17LIFE STYLES IN GRIMSBY
page.content: Most families own their own homes.They have lots of{modern gadgets}like T.V's telephones, record players, video and washing machines. Some even have a computer and microwave.Many{own a car, using it for pleasure and to go to work.Most{fathers work locally,lots of {mums work}too. We go to local schools and most stay for lunch. Some wear a uniform,some don't.Pets are kept,{dogs and{fish}being most popular. Most have {a yearly holiday}away,often in{tents} or{caravans.}Some go{abroad.}We spend weekends away too.Our{favourite past- {times}are{T.V.pop music and discos.}We like{casual clothes.}Sundays are for leisure,few go to church.Most enjoy a {roast Sunday lunch}together or summer barbecue.Fish and chips and hot-food take-aways are popular.We buy food in{ {supermarkets.}Most 10 year olds go to bed between 9-10 during the week.
